spatial_accuracy.notes: Excellent layout adherence. Minor wall alignment drift in the utility/kitchen corridor and slight scaling issues with the secondary toilets. Window placements are largely consistent, though some internal door swings are simplified.

structural_fidelity.notes: Perfect execution of structural constraints. Roof removed, no hallucinated rooms, zero text/labels, and a clean floating model on a dark neutral background.

furniture_mapping.notes: Clean block-style furniture is used. Sofa configuration in living area is slightly modified from plan (L-shape instead of two separate pieces), and dining chairs are simplified, but overall scale is correct.

aesthetic_quality.notes: Strict adherence to the aesthetic brief. Low-poly geometry, flat shading without textures, and a perfect isometric orthographic camera angle.

detected_errors.description: Minor layout distortion in the kitchen/utility wall thickness and the scaling of small bathroom fixtures compared to rooms.
Slight reinterpretation of the living room seating arrangement (L-shaped modular sofa vs discrete pieces in the floor plan).
